content: blue sky fibers complimentary pattern alpine hat design by karnina marie no 1302 no 1306 no 1315 gravel road a wild thyme b red rock c 50g hank mini hank mini hank no 1300 no 1309 no 1310 cast iron d earth ivy e cranberry compote f mini hank mini hank mini hank no 1303 highland fleece g mini hank experience level - advanced beginner materials - woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 50g/123yds 1 hank - woolstok bundle 100% fine highland wool 5g/12yds 21 mini hanks - size 6 4mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 7 4 5mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge alpine hat no 202025 - stitch marker - tapestry needle design by karnina marie pattern size a holiday hat full of cheer and joy a fun project that uses one - one hank of woolstok and one mini hank of woolstok for each stripe a color palette ideal for both men and women finished measurements - circumference 19 - height 9 gauge - in stockinette 22 sts and 30 row = 4 using largest needles complimentary pattern blue sky fibers rnds 13-16 with e k rnds 17-20 with f k rnds 21-24 with g k round 25 with a k crown decrease cont with a round 1 *k10 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 99 sts round 2 k round 3 *k9 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 90 sts round 4 k round 5 *k8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 81 sts round 6 k round 7 *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 72 sts abbreviations round 8 k circ circular round 9 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 63 sts co cast on round 10 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 54 sts cont continue round 11 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 45 sts k knit round 12 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 36 sts k1tbl knit 1 stitch through the back loop round 13 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 27 sts k2tog knit two together meas measure round 14 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 18 sts ndl s needle s round 15 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 9 sts pm place marker cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull rem remaining to close round s round s st s stitch es * repeat the directions between the asterisks as finishing many times as indicated weave in ends block as desired notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid longer fit comfortably on circular needle water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel
